none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 18, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Fuuuuuuukkkkkkk this one just doesn't get out of my head. Ultra catchy Montreal punk - forceful femme vocals and hook forever laid on top of a ridiculously solid rhythm section. The most obvious comparison is from France, though I think it sells MALOKIO somewhat short. There are only four song on this tape (five on their 2014 recording, that might actually be better), but these Québécois have set a seriously high bar for future efforts. Highest Escape recommendation.   MALOKIO
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oFxJASenYhk https://malokio.bandcamp.com/album/demo

seo.title: Malokio - Malokio demo 2018 - Terminal Escape
